short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides follower and following counts on X (formerly Twitter) profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X (Twitter) Follower Count Hider

   This extension hides follower and following counts on X (formerly Twitter) profiles, allowing you to browse without being influenced by these numbers. It replaces all follower and following counts with "•••", helping you focus on content rather than popularity metrics.

   Features:
   - Hides follower counts on all X (Twitter) profiles
   - Hides following counts on all X (Twitter) profiles
   - Works on both twitter.com and x.com domains
   - Automatically updates as you navigate through X (Twitter)
   - Lightweight and efficient

   Privacy Note: This extension does not collect or transmit any user data. It only modifies the display of follower counts on X (Twitter) pages you visit.
